entry.title: Maudlin
entry.summary:
Author: PutYourRecordsOn

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,402Chapters: 20/35Kudos: 97

Summary: (can be read without knowledge of Mission impossible or Batman only requires understanding of one)Before he was the IMF’s favorite tech guy, Benji Dunn was something else entirely—a medic for the League of Assassins, a reluctant part of their world, and somehow the only non-assassin adult Damian Wayne trusted. He never meant to care. He never meant to stay. And he definitely never meant to walk away from it all broken.Years later, the past doesn’t just catch up—it breaks the door down. With the Entity threatening the future, Damian and Jason back in his orbit, and Ethan Hunt watching him like he sees every secret Benji’s tried to bury, the life Benji built is starting to crack.A story of found family, sharp edges, and soft hearts. Of missions and mistakes, art and tea, and what it means to choose kindness in a world that asks you to kill.
